name: Starwire
description: Starwire is a global entertainment-focused monetary network that stores economic and creative energy. Using machine learning, blockchain technology, and smart contracts to provide a transparent way for any creative contributor of a digital asset to secure their IP and get paid every time money moves. The STR is a governance token that will allow the Starwire community to vote on proposals to fund creative projects, participate in Liquidity mining and qualify for Starwire perks.
